cards.name: Ace of Hearts
cards.rule: Waterfall – Everyone should keep drinking until the person who picked the card stops.

cards.name: 2 of Hearts
cards.rule: Choose – You can choose someone to drink.

cards.name: 3of Hearts
cards.rule: Me – You must drink.

cards.name: 4 of Hearts
cards.rule: Wh0re – All girls must drink.

cards.name: 5 of Hearts
cards.rule: Thumb Master – When you put your thumb on the table everyone must follow and whomever is last must drink.

cards.name: 6 of Hearts
cards.rule: Dicks – All guys drink.

cards.name: 7 of Hearts
cards.rule: Heaven – Point your finger in the sky, whoever is last must drink.

cards.name: 8 of Hearts
cards.rule: Mate – Choose someone to drink with you. He/she should always drink with you.

cards.name: 9 of Hearts
cards.rule: Rhyme – Pick a word, and the person next to you must rhyme with it until someone messes up. The one who messes up drinks.

cards.name: 10 of Hearts
cards.rule: Categories – Pick a category and everyone must name something in that category. Whoever messes up drinks.

cards.name: Jack of Hearts
cards.rule: Make a Rule – You can make up any rule that everyone has to follow. Disobey the rule, and you must drink.

cards.name: Queen of Hearts
cards.rule: Questions – Keep asking questions to each other. Whoever doesn’t say a question drinks.

cards.name: King of Hearts
cards.rule: Pour! – You must pour a little of your drink into the middle cup. The one who picks the last king drinks the whole cup.

nhiePrompts.prompt: Eaten an entire pizza by myself
Gotten lost in a new city
Sent a text to the wrong person
Accidentally liked an old photo on social media
Dyed my hair a crazy color
Had a crush on a teacher
Been locked out of my house
Accidentally swore in front of a child
Forgotten where I parked my car
Fallen in love at first sight
Stayed in my pajamas all day
Watched an entire series in one day
Cooked something and completely burned it
Bought something expensive and regretted it
Broken up with someone over text
Tried to take a selfie and failed
Said 'I love you' without meaning it
Lied to get out of work
Tried to cut my own hair
Forgotten someone's name right after meeting them
Jumped into a pool with clothes on
Lied about being sick to skip school or work
Locked my keys in the car
Had a surprise party thrown for me
Eaten something I didn't like just to be polite
Made a New Year's resolution and kept it
Eaten a whole box of candy in one sitting
